Protocol# SinglePlanePixelFormat

A pixel format that contains a single underlying vImage buffer.iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
protocol SinglePlanePixelFormat : PixelFormat
```
